flavorText: Each commander looked at the others and wondered who would be first to break the alliance.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Kommandeure blickten sich an und fragten sich, wer wohl zuerst aus der Allianz ausscheren würde.
foreignData.name: Gemeinsame Strategie
foreignData.text: Ein Spieler Deiner Wahl zieht für jeden Standardlandtyp unter den Ländern, die er kontrolliert, eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Les commandants s'entreregardèrent. Lequel romprait l'alliance en premier ?
foreignData.name: Stratégies d'alliances
foreignData.text: Le joueur ciblé pioche une carte pour chaque type de terrain de base parmi les terrains qu'il contrôle.

name: Allied Strategies
originalText: Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands he or she controls.

rulings.text: You draw one card per basic land type, not for each basic land. This makes it a maximum of 5 cards.
Domain abilities count the number of basic land types among lands you control, not how many lands you control or how many of any type.
The basic land types are Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. Land types other than basic land types (such as Desert) don’t contribute to domain abilities.

text: Domain — Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands they control.
